title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLM or chat backends with LangChain’s full toolchain.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat history, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-cli (maccam912/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting, managing models, and monitoring Ollama from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot (sugarforever/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama: Kotlin & Scala friendly, reactive streams, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb (ollama/ollama-rb)
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: idiomatic Ruby DSL, concurrent requests, Rails integration example.

title: ollama-docker-compose (ggerganov/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Collection of ready-made compose stacks: CPU-only, NVIDIA, ROCm, with Open-WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant.

title: ollama-chat (jmorganca/ollama-chat)
summary: Minimal React chat app using the Ollama JS client; showcases streaming and model selection.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/obsidian-ollama)
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, or translate text using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm (npm package)
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript package downloaded 100k+/week; zero native deps, browser & Node.

title: ollama PyPI (PyPI package)
summary: Official Python package with 50k+ weekly downloads; supports sync/async, embeddings, JSON mode.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration: plug Ollama models into pipelines for RAG, question-answering, summarization.

title: ollama-csharp (ollama/ollama-csharp)
summary: Official C#/.NET SDK: supports .NET 6+, IAsyncEnumerable streaming, Blazor & MAUI samples.

title: ollama-rust (ollama/ollama-rust)
summary: Community Rust crate: tokio-based async client, strongly typed request/response structs.

title: ollama-go (ollama/ollama-go)
summary: Official Go client: small surface, context cancellation, used internally by Ollama CLI.

title: awesome-ollama (awesome-ollama/awesome-ollama)
summary: Curated list of tools, libraries, tutorials, and model recipes in the Ollama ecosystem.
